hero.subtitle: Milano • 1994 • Artisanal
hero.headline: Quiet Luxury
hero.description: The intersection of architectural form and textile purity. Handcrafted for those who value the language of fabric.

materiality.headline: Tactile Architectures.
materiality.description: True elegance is quiet. It doesn't scream for recognition; it commands respect through the mastery of its construction and the integrity of its materials.

philosophy.headline: The Form is Eternal.
philosophy.description: Our aesthetic is defined by the grace of restraint. We don't design for the season; we design for the era.

craft.headline: Materials & Craftsmanship
craft.description: Our silk is harvested from the high plateaus of Mongolia and woven in our century-old looms in the heart of Como. We believe patience is our most valuable raw material.

collections.name: Midnight Velvet Blazer
collections.description: A tailored silhouette for evening mastery, featuring hand-stitched lapels and peak shoulders.

collections.name: Ivory Cascade Gown
collections.description: Floor-length ethereal draping designed to mimic the fluid motion of water under moonlight.

collections.name: Heritage Tweed Overcoat
collections.description: Classic warmth reimagined for the modern winter with sustainable insulation and weatherproof finish.

collections.name: Soleil Linen Shirt
collections.description: Breathable luxury for summer escapades, hand-woven to ensure natural cooling and relaxed fit.

collections.name: Mini Aurelian Knit
collections.description: Ultra-soft premium comfort for the next generation of style, hypoallergenic and durable.

collections.name: Ember Silk Scarf
collections.description: Hand-painted motifs of the autumn solstice, each scarf is a unique work of wearable art.

store.address: 427 Madison Avenue, 14th Floor, New York, NY 10017
